overview: Sin City ultra and Nic Cramer present the stunning Jessica Drake in a torrid tale of a schoolgirl who's secret life as a prostitute brings her to the very edge of disaster!  From one sexual liason to another she slowly becomes what she pretends to be...until there's nothing but a perverse shadow of her former self.  It's a tale of innocence lost and degradation found.
tagline: Student by day. Teacher by night.
title: Trick Baby
